general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University, covering academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. It also details administrative and support functions such as examination reports, academic bank of credits, curricula feedback, university brochures, and tenders. Furthermore, it highlights personal and professional development resources, including capacity building, skill enhancement, language and communication initiatives, soft skills, entrepreneurship, and innovation. The content also touches upon university history, leadership, statutory bodies, financial matters (tenders, insurance), international collaborations (Uzbekistan, Agra, credit transfer), and public-facing services like FM radio and online portals.

other_info.summary: This text provides a diverse range of information related to Sharda University, including its SUAT 2025 recruitment, global knowledge seeking initiatives, various university departments and services such as Banking And Postal Services, Leadership, and History. It also highlights academic offerings like Curricula Links for multiple academic years, career paths for engineering graduates, and various skill enhancement programs. Additionally, it includes important guidelines for international students regarding visas and medical insurance, along with mentions of innovation, entrepreneurship, FM radio, and important portals and resources.
